html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01922024-03-01PS, CBSA
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2021, No.1
Budget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1
SubjectOrder Fixing May 13, 2024 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 and the Budget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1 Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing May 13, 2024 at 3:00:00 a.m. as the day and time on which sections 209 to 211 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, NO. 1, chapter 23 of the Statutes of Canada, 2021, and sections 303, 329 and 330 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COME INTO FORCE in order to enable the launch of the Canada Border Services Agency’s Assessment and Revenue Management Project.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing May 13, 2024 at 3:00:00 a.m. as the day and time on which sections 209 to 211 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, NO. 1, chapter 23 of the Statutes of Canada, 2021, and sections 303, 329 and 330 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COME INTO FORCE in order to enable the launch of the Canada Border Services Agency’s Assessment and Revenue Management Project.
